data.title: Thailand to harness Airbus’ expertise in becoming aviation hub
data.description: Transport Ministry to work with Europe’s Airbus to expand aviation infrastructure and raise safety standards

data.title: Embassy urges Thais in South Korea to avoid protest areas
data.description: South Korean president imposes martial law to quell political protests only to rescind the order six hours later

data.title: Attraction of the ASEAN Economic Sphere: Japanese companies transferring production from China to Southeast Asia
data.description: An increasing number of Japanese companies operating in China are transferring their production bases to countries in the Association of Southeast Asian Nations (ASEAN). This comes as Chinese economic growth slows and concerns rise over the risks of doing business in China, where foreign residents have been arrested on vague grounds.

data.title: Attraction of the ASEAN Economic Sphere: Japanese companies transferring production from China to Southeast Asia

This comes as Chinese economic growth slows and concerns rise over the risks of doing business in China, where foreign residents have been arrested on vague grounds.

data.title: Central Department Store reinvents flagship Bangkok location
data.description: Central completes comprehensive 4-billion-baht renovation of its Chidlom branch

data.title: South Korea lifts martial law after lawmakers reject president’s decree
data.description: The president of South Korea early Wednesday lifted the martial law he imposed on the country hours earlier, bending to political pressure after a tense night in which troops surrounded parliament and lawmakers voted to reject military rule.

data.title: German Christmas market comes to Bangkok
data.description: Gearing up for the festive season, Goethe-Institut Thailand is organising the German Christmas Market 2024 on Sathon 1 this Saturday and Sunday, bringing joy to downtown Bangkok.

data.title: Illustration fair returns to CentralWorld
data.description: The Bangkok Illustration Fair is back with works by Thai and foreign illustrators at CentralWorld Live, 8th floor of CentralWorld, Ratchadamri Road, from tomorrow to Sunday.

data.title: South Korean president declares emergency martial law, blames opposition
data.description: South Korean President Yoon Suk Yeol declared an “emergency martial law,” Tuesday accusing the country’s opposition of controlling the parliament, sympathizing with North Korea and paralyzing the government with anti-state activities.

data.title: allnex's innovation journey in Southeast Asia - Miguel Mastas | EP.21
data.description: In this episode of Time to Talk, Mr. Miguel Matas takes us through GC plus allnex’s innovation journey in Southeast Asia.

data.title: Thailand’s BOI to boost sustainable investment with new tax structure
data.description: Measures of the five-year strategy include tax thresholds and a ‘tax collection and refund’ mechanism with a focus on supporting sustainable business practices

data.description: Comprehensive vision for technological solutions to sustainability challenges outlined

data.description: Proposed reforms target corporate income tax, personal income tax, and VAT

data.title: Nation Group sets ambitious green targets for 2035
data.description: The group’s CEO, Shine Bunnag, announces plans to reduce, and offset carbon emissions through reforestation and the adoption of green business practices

data.title: NBTC, police dismantle massive illegal cable network
data.description: Network was supplying call centre gangs across borders

data.title: Koh Chang’s famous ‘abandoned ship hotel’ goes up in flames
data.description: The authorities are contacting the owner to estimate damages as firefighters reckon it will take three days for the flames to consume the property

data.title: Chiang Mai Night Safari pauses star tiger Eva’s display
data.description: Zoo’s star strawberry tiger will take a temporary break because she is at reproductive age and requires regular checkups

data.title: Conditional release of Boonsong ‘not paving way’ for Yingluck return
data.description: Minister of justice says that beyond Boonsong, other prisoners involved in rice-pledging scandal may get conditional release

data.title: Thailand to introduce retirement lottery to foster long-term savings
data.description: Lottery tickets will cost 50 baht each, with a draw for five 1-million baht prizes held every Friday; savings plus interest will be returned to members when they turn 60

data.title: AirAsia’s delayed ticket refund prompts consumer body’s reaction

data.title: Songkhla district chief denies volunteers’ claim of robbery
data.description: Thepha chief refuted volunteers’ claims, saying the villagers only asked for their share of the relief bags loudly, and did not steal them
